column10: Things that this data needs to account for:
- How much solar energy is available at any given time
column11: Different "Condition" strings will be tied to specific solar potential values. E.g. "Partly Cloudy" = 55

column10: - How much wind energy is available at any given time
column11: Wind Speed - with a floor/ceiling cap on MPH. E.g. over 20mph they govern the speed. Under 10mph and the turbines don't even turn.

column10: - How much hydro energy is available at any given time
column11: This one won't be affected by environmental data. For simplicity, it will always be fully available. Limitation comes there only being two panels.

column10: - Onscreen background visuals of current weather
column11: Condition + time of day. Time of day is almost more important.
Always available. Not affected by environmental data
Always available. Not affected by environmental data
